gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.agreement

Interface Agreement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcronymAgreement, AdjacencyAgreement, AnimacyAgreement, ClosestRCMODAgreement, DiscourseConnectiveAgreement, DocumentTopicAgreement, ExactStringAgreement, GenderAgreement, HeadWordAgreement, HypernymListAgreement, KeyValuePairAgreement, NonPostModifierMatchAgreement, NumberAgreement, OntologyAgreement, PersonAgreement, PredicateAgreement, PredicateNominativeAgreement, ProperHeadWordAgreement, RelativePronDependencyAgreement, RelaxedHeadMatchAgreement, RelaxedStemAgreement, SemanticCoercionAgreement, SemanticGroupAgreement, SemanticTypeAgreement, StrictHeadMatchAgreement, SyntacticAppositiveAgreement, TaxonomyAgreement

    public interface Agreement
    The interface for defining and implementing agreement constraints between a coreferential mention and a candidate referent.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean agree(CoreferenceType corefType, ExpressionType expType, SurfaceElement expression, SurfaceElement referent)
      Method to implement to calculate agreement between a coreferential mention and a candidate referent.

    • Method Detail

      • agree

        boolean agree(CoreferenceType corefType,
              ExpressionType expType,
              SurfaceElement expression,
              SurfaceElement referent)
        Method to implement to calculate agreement between a coreferential mention and a candidate referent.
        Parameters:
        corefType - the type of coreference being considered (e.g., CoreferenceType.Anaphora)
        expType - the type of coreferential mention type being considered (e.g., ExpressionType.PersonalPronoun)
        expression - the coreferential mention
        referent - the candidate referent
        Returns:
        true if the mention and the candidate agree on the criterion established by the implementing class
